name: MEPuzzleGame
description:
Puzzle Game made for a challenge from my friend Mostafa

The game Contain 6 Levels

Lv1 -> 9 Pieces

Lv2 -> 18 pieces

Lv3 - > 36 Pieces

Lv4 -> 36 Pieces

Lv 5 -> 72 Pieces

Lv 6 -> 72

I made this game (programming - Art) in just 4 hours

Engine : Unity

Art Software : Krita
